original_title: Tæt på, lige ved & næsten fri
overview: Trapped in a hut with his mysterious ex-girlfriend Ena and their common dog, Victor has to deal with the dead animals that inexplicably appear around them. Ena's behavior becomes more and more strange, as the mood in the house becomes more and more gloomy. Soon, Victor has to find the best way to get out of both the house and the sunken relationship.
title: Close, Almost & Nearly Free
